item.title: Using Publish and Github to Make a Website
item.description: We take a dive into using Publish and Github to setup a website and get our first blog post online!
item.content:encoded:
Using Publish and Github to Make a Website

Used https://github.com/JohnSundell/Publish to generate a website.

Not sure exactly how to use it yet but thought I'd just go ahead and make a 1% improvement.

More things yet to do: - Figure out how to automatically deploy to github - Use code blocks - Define some colors on custom theme

Thank you John Sundell and github for making this so easy!

Used all the defaults from the new site published:

try Websitedef().publish(
	withTheme: .foundation,
	deployedUsing: .gitHub("shawnkc/shawnkc.github.io")
)
